explains: n. 教皇，罗马教皇；权威，大师
wordGroup: pope benedict xvi 教皇本笃十六世（现任天主教教宗）
alexander pope 亚历山大·蒲柏（英国诗人）

sentences.en: The Pope was speaking ex cathedra.
sentences.cn: 教皇以宗座权威正式宣言。

sentences.en: The Pope has anointed him as Archbishop.
sentences.cn: 教皇给他施以膏油，以示他成为大主教。

sentences.en: The Pope granted her a private audience.
